title.rendered: “IDF Strikes: Key Palestinian Islamic Jihad Operative Eliminated in Gaza”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF eliminated a terrorist from the Palestinian Islamic Jihad organization who was involved in promoting and developing the organization’s missile system.

Earlier today (Tuesday), an Israeli Air Force aircraft, guided by the Southern Command and Military Intelligence, targeted the city of Gaza and eliminated the terrorist Fadi Jihad Muhammad Al-Wadiya, who was an operative in the Palestinian Islamic Jihad organization and was engaged in the development and promotion of the organization’s missile system.
Additionally, the terrorist was a unique knowledge center in the organization in the fields of electronics and chemistry.

Attached is documentation of the elimination: https://bit.ly/4cd3PL6
